name: Team Aqua Technical Machine 01
effect: Attach this card to 1 of your Pokémon that has Team Aqua in its name. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Team Aqua Technical Machine 01.
author: Mitsuhiro Arita

attacks.name: Miracle
attacks.effect: Choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.
